item.title: Raspberry Pi WordPress LAMP server: JUST the commands you need to make it happen
item.description: If you have a Raspberry Pi and would like to turn it into a web server to host your own WordPress website, here are all the commands to make that happen. There is no fluff, just copy the commands one-by-one and youâ€™ll have your site up and running in no time!
